name: Starcatcher (itch) (Escada Games)
description:
Collect stars on this space platformer!

 Made for the One Button Jam 2022. Hence, only one button is needed to play!

 Inspirations: Out There Somewhere, Kirby, Metroid, Wallker Demolition Co., Gravitron Experiment (yeah, I ended up taking using two of our other games as reference here and there).

Credits

Fonts used  were the Star Ranger by Damien Guard, and Mago3 by the Nimble Beasts Collective. Palette used was the SLSO8.

Software used:

  • Godot Engine v3.5 Stable;
  • Audacity v2.4.1;
  • Deflemask v0.12.1, module YM2151;
  • LibreSprite v1.0-dev;
  • LabChirp v1.60;
  • Screen To Gif 2.31;
  • GIMP v2.10.32.
